author: IGN
description: Get a look at Lost Rift in this reveal trailer for the upcoming supernatural survival game set on a desert island. Lost Rift features PvP and PvPvE gameplay, and it is coming to Steam Early Access in 2025.
title: Lost Rift - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a behind-the-scenes look at The Alters in this latest video for the upcoming sci-fi game from 11 bit studios, the creators of This War of Mine and Frostpunk. The video details how The Alters begins as a typical survival game but evolves into more, and how the team prioritized finding the right balance for the game. The Alters will be available in 2025 on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X|S, also in Xbox Game Pass and PC Game Pass.

After crash-landing on a hostile planet under a blazing sun, Jan must survive in a high-tech mobile base designed for a crew he doesn’t have. His luck changes when he discovers Rapidium, a resource that, when paired with the Quantum Computer, lets him create Alters—alternate versions of himself based on changing the pivotal decisions from his past.

The Alters aren’t just workers—they’re individuals with their own skills, emotions, and motivations. While essential for keeping the base functional, crafting tools, and mining resources, their dis
title: The Alters - Official Game Overview

author: IGN
description:
Journey to a hand-painted 2.5D world, check out action-packed gameplay, and more in this latest trailer for Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree, an upcoming dark fantasy action RPG. Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S on April 17, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Learn about the story of Industria 2 in this new trailer for this narrative FPS adventure about a woman stranded in a parallel dimension. Explore, scavenge and fight your way through a mysterious boreal landscape consumed by an ever-hungry artificial intelligence to find a way home. Industria 2 will be available on PC (via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG).

In Industria 2, you play as Nora, a woman stranded in a parallel dimension. Explore, scavenge, and fight through a mysterious boreal landscape consumed by an ever-hungry artificial intelligence to find a way home. Navigating this hostile terrain, you must confront dangerous robots, unravel the mystery of the sinister A.I., and ultimately find a way back home to 1989 East Berlin.
title: Industria 2 - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Dark Mass is the first-ever underwater horror game set inside a sunken manor, where psychological terror, immersive exploration, and survival merge in the depths of the unknown. As Alice, a deep-sea explorer, you and your brother Reed uncover a long-forgotten wreck. But beneath it lies something far more sinister—a manor lost to time, untouched by the world above, hiding a dark curse. Survive the horrors lurking within, solve disturbing ritualistic puzzles, and make choices that will shape your fate.

Dark Mass is coming soon to Steam, PlayStation, and Xbox.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Dark Mass - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Painkiller is back: bloodier and more brutal than ever. Watch the Painkiller reveal trailer for this upcoming game that brings co-op action, relentless waves of enemies, and devastating weaponry designed to chew through the underworld. Team up with friends and stand strong together against demonic forces in this explosive comeback. Painkiller launches on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X|S in Fall 2025.
title: Painkiller - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Avatar Legends: Realms Collide is available now on the App Store for iOS and Google Play for Android and PC. Check out the Avatar Legends: Realms Collide launch trailer for this 4X strategy game to see gameplay and more as you embark on a journey to restore harmony and balance to the world - just like the Avatar.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Avatar Legends: Realms Collide - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Oldest House has been taken over by an unlikely threat: Sticky Notes. Their endless replication needs to be stopped immediately but they won’t go down without a fight and the Hiss will be there to hinder you every step of the way. Check out action-packed gameplay from FBC: Firebreak in this latest trailer for the upcoming 3-player cooperative first-person shooter set within the enigmatic Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). As the Bureau’s headquarters faces a deadly and prolonged siege by otherworldly forces, only Firebreak—its most adaptable response unit—has the skills and courage to restore order. 

FBC: Firebreak will be available in summer 2025 on PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, Xbox Series X|S, and PS5 (PlayStation 5).
title: FBC: Firebreak - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
title: How to do one-hit assassinations in Assassin's Creed Shadows! #assassinscreed #shadows #ign #guide

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the brutal world of I Hate This Place in this reveal teaser trailer for the upcoming open-world survival horror game based on the comic by Kyle Starks and Artyom Topilin. I Hate This Place will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch in Q4 2025.

Players take on the role of Elena, whose fight for survival begins when she unwittingly awakens a malevolent force. Outmatched and hunted in a hostile world, players must think fast, manipulating their surroundings to even the odds against formidable foes.
title: I Hate This Place - Official Reveal Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the thrilling new gameplay trailer for the highly anticipated post-apocalyptic MMO shooter, PIONER. The video provides an exciting glimpse into the game's dark and immersive world, featuring intense combat and atmospheric environments set on a mysterious Soviet-era island.
PIONER is set to launch on PC in late 2025, with console releases planned for a later date.
title: PIONER - Official Gameplay Trailer #2

author: IGN
description: Hunted by her evil stepmother, Snow White (Loutsis) must overcome the horrors of the dark forest and make unlikely friends with 7 murderous dwarves in this dark retelling of the classic fairy tale.
title: The Death of Snow White - Official Trailer (2025) Sanae Loutsis, Chelsea Edmundson, Tristan Nokes

author: IGN
description: Join developers and co-directors Wojciech Piejko and Jacek Zięba for a behind-the-scenes look at Cronos: The New Dawn in this new video for the upcoming survival horror game from developer Bloober Team. The team discusses the influences behind the creation of Cronos: The New Dawn, gives insight into the protagonist, character design, the world of Cronos and its sci-fi setting, the terrifying creatures you'll face, and answers community questions. Cronos: The New Dawn will be available on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S in 2025.
title: Cronos: The New Dawn - Official Game Overview

author: IGN
description: The three-player PvE first-person multiplayer shooter and Control spinoff FBC: Firebreak, so far, passes the eye test. It's almost certainly not a run-of-the-mill multiplayer shooter, in a very good way. And the fact that it’s a get-in and get-out online game that doesn’t require a massive ongoing time commitment in order to enjoy it is a refreshing throwback to the days when that was the norm. Previewed by Ryan McCaffrey
title: FBC: Firebreak Is the Control Multiplayer FPS I Didn’t Know I Wanted

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord trailer for a peek at the War Sails expansion, which adds new strategic depths that cut across the vast open world of Calradia. The expansion includes the new Nord Viking-inspired faction, a naval campaign, an expanded map to explore, naval warfare, and more to the action RPG. Players can command fleets, engage in ship battles, board enemy vessels, and enforce blockades, reshaping warfare across both land and sea. The War Sails expansion for Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord will be available on PC via Steam, Xbox Series X|S, and PS5 (PlayStation 5) on June 17, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord - Official War Sails Expansion Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Nightdive Studios has announced that System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary Remaster - its modernized edition of the 1999 classic sci-fi horror action role-playing game will be released on PC and consoles on June 26, 2025. Prepare yourselves, insects.

#IGN #Gaming
title: System Shock 2 - Official Remaster Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days gets a new trailer and an early access release date reveal. Check out the latest, tense trailer for Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days for this upcoming shelter survival game set in a zombie-infested Texas. Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days will be available on PC via Steam Early Access on April 9, 2025. It will also come to Mac devices during Early Access. A Mac demo is coming soon to Steam.


As the scorching summer temperature of 1980 rises in the city of Walton, Texas, so too do hordes of the undead. Law and order quickly give way to chaos and confusion as human survivors band together to stay alive. Lead a group of survivors on a dangerous journey to avoid zombies, establish shelters, and seek an escape from Walton.
title: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days - Official Early Access Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out action-packed gameplay and the brutal world of Hell Clock in this trailer for the upcoming roguelike action RPG. Hell Clock will be available on PC in 2025. A demo is out now.
title: Hell Clock - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Whispers of old magic stir in the bayou and the gulch, where the line between healing and hexing is dangerously thin. Watch the latest Hunt: Showdown 1896 trailer for a look at the Garden of the Witch event, which introduces a narrative pitting mystical forces and industrial occultism against the encroaching Corruption. The event features new hunters, cosmetics, exclusive sealed traits, and more. The Garden of the Witch event will be available as part of Update 2.3, which includes quality-of-life features, fixes, and tweaks. The Garden of the Witch event for Hunt: Showdown 1896 begins March 26 until May 5, 2025.

When Hunters return home, someone has to patch their wounds and repair their gear. But what happens when even this falls apart and the healers and the fixers are forced to fight too? Garden of the Witch explores this question through a tale of desperation and resilience of the Hunters wounded and left behind.

The Event story sees The Brujas, masters of organic mysticism, fa
title: Hunt Showdown 1896 - Official Garden of the Witch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join Director Motohide Eshiro, also the original director of Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny (2002), for a discussion about the sword-fighting action and new features coming to Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny in this latest trailer for the upcoming remaster of the action game. We get to learn about Hell Mode and more. Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny will be available on PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Steam on May 23, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny - Official 2nd Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the El Ravaca Trailer for The First Berserker: Khazan, an action-adventure RPG developed by Neople. This latest trailer shows off a part of the world players will experience in The First Berserker: Khazan called El Ravaca. El Ravaca is said to be home to mysterious disappearances, unspeakable experiments, and potentially where everything went wrong. Explore El Ravaca in The First Berserker: Khazan, launching on March 27 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: The First Berserker: Khazan - Official El Ravaca Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet Maelle (voiced by Jennifer English), the youngest member of the Expedition. A shy loner, eager to fly. Watch the latest Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 trailer to see Maelle in action ahead of the release of this upcoming RPG. Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, Epic Games Store, and Steam on April 24, 2025.

Orphaned at age 3, Maelle has never felt at home in Lumière. She has difficulty connecting with and trusting others, but has come to appreciate her foster brother Gustave.At 16 years of age, Maelle is significantly younger than her fellow Expeditioners. Unlike them, she views the Expedition as her chance to explore the world beyond Lumière and finally forge her own destiny.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Official Maelle Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Snow White, reviewed by Siddhant Adlakha. Narrated by Nicholas Limon.

The best Disney live-action remake in a decade (not that that’s a particularly high bar to clear), Snow White adapts the broad strokes of the 1937 original, while fleshing out its themes of kindness. Rachel Zegler crafts a remarkable, melodic version of the classic princess who leads with her heart, even if her CGI co-stars are difficult on the eyes.

#IGN #Movies
title: Snow White Review

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Farming Simulator: 16 Bit-Edition launch trailer for the retro pixel-based version of the hit farming simulation game developed by Giants Software. Players will manage their farm to sell produce to facilitate expansions all in handmade pixel art. The game is packed with digitized engine sounds and retro-styled music for players to enjoy. Farming Simulator: 16 Bit-Edition is available now on the Farming Simulator shop or the Collector's Edition for PC.

#FarmingSimulator #Gaming #IGN
title: Farming Simulator: 16 Bit-Edition - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Ever since AC Origins, the Assassin’s Creed games have evolved from open-world stealth games to full-on RPGs, complete with gear levels, states, and enemy levels. But there’s always been one thing that’s irked players; when you assassinate enemies, sometimes they just don’t die. If you’re itching to make your game feel like classic Assassin’s Creed, then this video will show you how to do it.

#IGN #Gaming #AssassinsCreedShadows
title: AC Shadows: How to Assassinate ANY Enemy In ONE HIT

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Deliver At All Costs release date trailer for the action destruction game developed by Studio Far Out Games. Players will embody Winston Green, a delivery man in tough times who wields a chaotic desire to deliver the mail by any means necessary. Drive with reckless avail, scale rooftops, and leave a trail of calamity behind to deliver cargo to its final destination. Deliver At All Costs is launching on May 22, 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).

#IGN #Games #Gaming
title: Deliver At All Costs - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
You have a ton of options right at the start of the game with regards to where to spend your many mastery points in Assassin's Creed Shadows. If you want our recommendations of how to build Naoe right from the start of the game, here are our recommendations for the Skills to Get First in Assassin's Creed Shadows.

00:00 Intro
01:18 Melee Expert
01:50 Shadow Piercer
02:32 Smoke Bomb
03:01 Executioner
03:20 Quick Throw
03:51 Gap Seeker
04:07 Prodigy
04:52 Assassination Damage 1
05:17 Shadow Barrage
05:54 Vault
06:35 Backstabber
07:04 Backstab
07:27 Shuriken
07:53 Shinobi Bell
08:12 Double Assassinate
08:30 Larger Tool Bag
08:54 Nightcrawler

#IGN #Gaming #AssassinsCreedShadows
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Skills to Get First

author: IGN
description:
One warrior stands upon the battlefield… while another lives in the darkness. Watch the Assassin's Creed Shadows launch trailer for this open-world, action RPG. Assassin's Creed Shadows is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, macOS, Amazon Luna, and PC (Steam).

In Assassin’s Creed Shadows, you will live the intertwined stories of Naoe, an adept shinobi Assassin from Iga Province, and Yasuke, the powerful African samurai of historical legend. Against the backdrop of the turbulent late Sengoku period, this remarkable duo will discover their common destiny as they usher in a new era for Japan.

#IGN #Gaming #AssassinsCreedShadows
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the WWE 2K25 accolades trailer for the new wrestling game developed by Visual Concepts. Step into the ring with your favorite WWE stars to duke it out across a variety of different modes. Watch the latest trailer to garner the critical reception for WWE 2K25, available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#Wrestling #WWE #WWE2K25
title: WWE 2K25 - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
To celebrate Women's History Month, IGN sat down with the creators of the new spinoff series of Mythic Quest - Side Quest! We chatted with Katie McElhenney (co-creator/executive producer), Ashly Burch (co-creator/executive producer), Megan Ganz (executive producer), and Genevieve Jones (executive producer) about what it was like working with so many women on this series, experiences they've had in the industry, and advice for any women wanting to step into similar roles themselves. 
Side Quest premieres on March 26, 2025 on Apple TV+.
title: Creators of Side Quest Talk Togetherness as Women Working in the Industry

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Atomfall in this latest trailer for the upcoming single-player survival action RPG. Atomfall will be available on Game Pass on day one, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Windows PC, PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, PS5 (PlayStation 5) and PS4 (PlayStation 4) on March 27, 2025. 

Set in the aftermath of a nuclear disaster, Atomfall tasks players with solving the mystery of what happened at the Windscale nuclear power station. To solve this, you will need to navigate military encampments, delve through abandoned bunkers below ground, and risk your life in Pagan ruins.

Atomfall is inspired by the real life Windscale nuclear incident in the 1950s. Players will embark on a fictionalized adventure, encountering a cast of weird and wonderful characters as they try to uncover the mystery and escape the quarantine zone.

#Atomfall #Gaming #Games
title: Atomfall - Official Pre-Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the God of War Ragnarok trailer for its 20th Anniversary Dark Odyssey Collection, coming to the action-adventure franchise developed by Sony Santa Monica. Players can gain access to the legendary Dark Odyssey Collection of in-game cosmetics inspired by the difficult-to-acquire Dark Odyssey skin from God of War 2. The Dark Odyssey Collection will be released via a free update on March 20 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), and PC.

#GodOfWar #GodOfWarRagnarok #Gaming
title: God of War Ragnarok - Official 20th Anniversary Dark Odyssey Collection Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Learn what you can expect from the Founder’s Pack for Game of Thrones: Kingsroad in this new trailer for the upcoming action-adventure RPG, including costumes, the Darkcloud and White Fang mounts, and more. Each tier of the Founder's Pack comes with Early Access to the complete game, as well as items including exclusive costumes, mounts, season passes, and items. 

Game of Thrones: Kingsroad launches into Early Access on Steam on March 26, 2025. Pre-registration is also available now through the App Store and Google Play store on iOS and Android devices, respectively. The Game of Thrones: Kingsroad's Founder's Pack will be available to purchase beginning March 21, 2025. 

ame of Thrones: Kingsroad is set to launch across various territories in 2025 on PC via Steam or through Windows Launcher, as well as on iOS and Android devices.

#IGN #Gaming #GameOfThrones
title: Game of Thrones: Kingsroad - Official Founder's Pack Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Mars Attracts, the park management sim set in the world of the cult-classic movie Mars Attacks, has a demo dropping on Steam today. Watch this new trailer to get hyped up, and then download the demo for yourself on the Mars Attracts Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2760580/Mars_Attracts/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mars Attracts - Official Demo Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Prepare to journey to Westeros. Check out the latest Game of Thrones: Kingsroad trailer for the upcoming action-adventure RPG to see iconic characters you can encounter, gameplay, and more. Game of Thrones: Kingsroad launches into Early Access on Steam on March 26, 2025. Pre-registration is also available now through the App Store and Google Play store on iOS and Android devices, respectively. 

Upon launch, players will be able to enjoy a full cross-play experience across all supported platforms and devices. Game of Thrones: Kingsroad is set to launch across various territories in 2025 on PC via Steam or through Windows Launcher, as well as on iOS and Android devices.

#IGN #Gaming #GameOfThrones
title: Game of Thrones: Kingsroad - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the One Battle After Another teaser trailer for the crime drama thriller film distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures.

When their evil enemy resurfaces after 16 years, a group of ex-revolutionaries reunites to rescue one of their own's daughter.

One Battle After Another stars Leonardo DiCaprio, Benicio Del Toro, Sean Penn, Regina Hall, Wood Harris, Teyana Taylor, and more. The film is directed and written by Paul Thomas Anderson.

One Battle After Another will be released in theaters on September 26.

#Movies #Trailer #IGN
title: One Battle After Another - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Leonardo DiCaprio, Sean Penn

author: IGN
description:
Check out some Digimon's special moves in action in this latest Digimon Story: Time Stranger trailer for the upcoming RPG. Digimon Story: Time Stranger will be available on PC (Steam), PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S in 2025.

#Digimon #DigimonStory #Gaming
title: Digimon Story: Time Stranger - Official Special Moves Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here are our favourite times Assassin’s Creed completely rewrote the past. From the first time we were introduced to the assassins and templar war, to Yasuke's appearance in Assassin's Creed Shadows, the Assassin's Creed games series has changed dozens of historical facts to better suit the story being told. These are our 10 favourite times Assassin's Creed changed history.

#AssassinsCreed #AssassinsCreedShadows #Gaming
title: 10 Times Assassin's Creed Changed History

author: IGN
description:
Meet the Kin of Sheredyn faction from Endless Legend 2 in this new trailer for the upcoming turn-based strategy game from developer Amplitude Studios. Get a deep dive into the Kin of Sheredyn faction, learn about their story, objectives, their abilities, and how they play. Descended from interstellar explorers, this hardened society will defend its lands at all costs while searching for its lost leader. Endless Legend 2 will be coming soon to PC Early Access.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Endless Legend 2 - Official Kin of Sheredyn Faction Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Atelier Yumia × Tekken 8 teaser trailer revealing a collaboration with the 3D fighting game, Tekken 8, which is coming to the RPG, Atelier Yumia. Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and Steam on March 21, 2025.

#Tekken8 #AtelierYumia #Gaming
title: Atelier Yumia × Tekken 8 - Official Collaboration Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Podcast Beyond 888, It’s been in the works for years, and delayed by several months, but Assassin’s Creed Shadows is finally here, and it’s worth the wait. Y’know, assuming you like big huge open-world games, don’t mind when Assassin’s Creed games veer into RPG territory, and are interested in the feudal Japanese setting. Now, the big question: what does this mean for 2025’s OTHER big huge open-world samurai game, Ghost of Yotei? Will it be a samurai showdown, or will a rising tide raise all ships? Either way, anyone who likes running around killing dudes with a katana and shuriken is eating good this year.

Check out the full episode of Podcast Beyond here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UNUOsK0ZNis

This week’s show is Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Mark Medina, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet

Beyond! is a part of Geek Media Podcast Network, an IGN Entertainment Brand.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows Sets a High Bar For Ghost of Yotei - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
InZOI, the Sims-like game from Krafton, will soon be in early acess. InZOI appears to be Krafton's answer to the fan-favorite series, The Sims, from EA. We were lucky enought to get some early hands-on time with the game ahead of the early access release. Here's the first 21 minutes of InZOI gameplay.

#IGN #Gaming
title: InZOI Gameplay: The First 21 Minutes
